All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    ConjugatedItem
    A conjugated item in a ConjugationTable instance.
    ConjugationTable
    Holds the conjugation table and makes its composition work easy
    Conjugator
    This class applies the rules for verb conjugation for every tense, voice, mode etc..
    DeclensedItem
    Holds the declensed item attributes.
    DeclensionTable
    Holds the declension items and makes the composition work easy.
    Declensor
    This class applies the rules governing the noun declension process.
    EnumHarmony
    Enumerated harmony types.
    EnumNounCases
    Enumerated noun cases.
    EnumNounPersons
    Enumerated possessive persons of nominative.
    EnumNounPluralities
    Enumerated noun pluralities.
    EnumPartsOfSpeech
    Enumerated parts of speech.
    EnumVerbDefiniteness
    Enumerated verb definitenesses.
    EnumVerbModes
    Enumerated verb modes.
    EnumVerbPersons
    Enumerated verb persons.
    EnumVerbTenses
    Enumerated verb tenses.
    EnumVerbVoices
    Enumerated verb voices.
    FilterUtils
    Utility class for applying filters upon verb conjugation work.
    GenericFilter
    A generic filter, extended by NounDeclensionFilter and VerbConjugatedFilter.
    Noun
    Noun is a word that names a being in the world.
    NounDeclensionFilter
    The filter for noun declension.
    Term
    Holds the basic attributes of any word in the Lavi language.
    Verb
    Represents a verb, a word that indicates the attributes of an action related to the time and mode of the action, to the agent and, sometimes, the object.
    VerbConjugationFilter
    The filter for verb conjugation.
